data.comment: The match has started at Elland Road.
Robert Jones signals a Burnley throw-in in Leeds's half.
In the minute 3, Corner awarded to Burnley.
Robert Jones awards Leeds a goal kick.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Leeds.
In the minute 5, Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Patrick Bamford.
Leeds's Ezgjan Alioski gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Leeds at Elland Road.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Burnley surge into the attack at Elland Road but James Tarkowskiâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 10, Leeds have a goal kick.
Free kick in a good position for Burnley!
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 14, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Leeds Leeds drive forward through Rodrigo Moreno. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In Leeds Leeds attack through Raphinha. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 16, Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Raphinha of Leeds is pulled up for offside.
Free kick Burnley.
In the minute 18, Robert Jones signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ben Mee for Burnley who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Robert Jones awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 20, Ben Mee for Burnley is back on the field again.
Free kick for Leeds in the half of Burnley.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
In the minute 22, Leeds have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Corner awarded to Leeds.
Leeds have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
In the minute 23, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Leeds are pushing forward but Mateusz Klich's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 25, Goal kick for Burnley at Elland Road.
Can Leeds capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Burnley's half?
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 27, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Robert Jones signals a free kick to Leeds.
In the minute 28, Mateusz Klich for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Robert Jones awards Burnley a goal kick.
James Tarkowski is booked for the away team.
Burnley awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 30, Burnley push upfield and James Tarkowski gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Leeds defence.
Leeds pushes forward through Jack Harrison, whose finish on goal is saved.
Burnley to take a throw-in in Leeds territory.
In the minute 33, Robert Jones signals a Burnley throw-in in Leeds's half.
Robert Jones signals a throw-in for Burnley, close to Leeds's area.
Chris Wood (Burnley) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 33, Ball goes out of play for a Leeds goal kick.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Erik Pieters of Burnley gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Leeds awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 39, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Leeds's Raphinha gets in a shot on goal at Elland Road. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 41, Leeds needs to be cautious. Burnley have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in Leeds.
Robert Jones signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 44, Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
Rodrigo Moreno (Leeds) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Burnley have a goal kick.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
Robert Jones signals a free kick to Leeds in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Elland Road.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Can Leeds get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Burnley's half?
Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Leeds.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leeds.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
In the minute 51, Burnley's James Tarkowski has run offside.
Raphinha (Leeds) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 54, Ashley Barnes (Burnley) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Matthew Lowton of Burnley smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leeds.
In the minute 56, Leeds are coming forward and Patrick Bamford gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Burnley's Josh Brownhill is on target but unsuccessful.
Burnley's Josh Brownhill breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 58, Goal kick for Leeds at Elland Road.
Robert Jones signals a Burnley throw-in in Leeds's half.
Leeds make their first substitution with Pablo Hernandez replacing Rodrigo Moreno.
In the minute 60, Robert Jones awards the home team a throw-in.
Leeds to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Burnley drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 61, Burnley have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
Leeds have a goal kick.
In the minute 63, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Leeds's Stuart Dallas breaks free at Elland Road. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 66, Robert Jones awards Burnley a goal kick.
In Leeds a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Jamie Shackleton is replacing Mateusz Klich for the home team.
In the minute 68, Robert Jones signals a free kick to Burnley.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Leeds awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, The home team replace Raphinha with Ian Poveda.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Leeds's Pablo Hernandez goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to Leeds.
Throw-in for Leeds close to the penalty box.
Robert Jones blows against Leeds's Jack Harrison for offside.
In the minute 73, Robert Jones signals a free kick to Burnley in their own half.
Burnley drives forward and Ashley Barnes gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Dale Stephens for Burnley drives towards goal at Elland Road. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Jay Rodriguez is on a sub for Erik Pieters for Burnley.
In the minute 74, Dale Stephens is replacing Josh Benson for Burnley at Elland Road.
In the minute 75, Ian Poveda for Leeds gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Throw-in Leeds.
In the minute 77, Leeds to take a throw-in in Burnley territory.
Burnley have a goal kick.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
In the minute 79, Ashley Westwood for Burnley has been booked by Robert Jones and receives a first yellow card.
Ball goes out of play for a Burnley goal kick.
Throw-in for Burnley in their own half.
In the minute 82, Can Burnley get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leeds's half?
Burnley's Jay Rodriguez misses with an attempt on goal.
Robert Jones awards Leeds a goal kick.
In the minute 83, In Leeds Leeds's Ian Poveda is caught offside.
Throw-in for Burnley at Elland Road.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
In the minute 87, Ashley Barnes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Burnley.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
Throw-in for Burnley in the half of Leeds.
In the minute 88, Dale Stephens (Burnley) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Burnley's Chris Wood is whistled for offside at Elland Road.
Ball safe as Burnley is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Leeds in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Burnley drive upfield and Matthew Lowton gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leeds defender.
Corner awarded to Burnley.
Robert Jones signals a Burnley throw-in in Leeds's half.
Free kick for Burnley in the half of Leeds.
Burnley have been awarded a corner by Robert Jones.
That's full-time at Elland Road. The final score is 1-0.
Ashley Barnes (Burnley) has received a first yellow card.
